TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationIDAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationIDAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationIDAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为该程序集指定应用程序 ID（作为 GUID）。

span.span: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将在其构造函数中的 GUID。 takes a GUID in its constructor. 注册时，在程序集中组件安装在具有给定 id 对应的应用程序When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type.
